name: Calculate Hours for Plan Drawings
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Plan Drawings:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((24*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Overall Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Enlarged Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Building Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Room Plans)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Overall Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Enlarged Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Building Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Room Plans)*>))*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((24*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Overall Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Enlarged Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Building Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Room Plans)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Overall Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Enlarged Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Building Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Room Plans)*>))*0.25))*1) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval((((24*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Overall Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Enlarged Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Building Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Room Plans)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Overall Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Enlarged Site Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Building Plans)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Room Plans)*>))*0.25))*1)*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
